trans-unit.source: General settings for MP Core extension
trans-unit.target: Allgemeine Einstellungen für die MP Core Extension

trans-unit.source: Settings for content elements and media
Design tokens, colors, fonts, and breakpoints
Meta tag settings for HTML head
All relevant page IDs can be set here.
trans-unit.target: Hier können alle relevanten Seiten-IDs eingestellt werden.

trans-unit.source: Page ID of the categories folder
Page ID of the additional logos or banners in the header area
trans-unit.target: Seiten-ID der zusätzlichen Logos oder Banner im Kopfbereich

trans-unit.source: Page ID of the meta navigation in the main navigation
trans-unit.target: Seiten-ID der Metanavigation in der Hauptnavigation

trans-unit.source: Page ID of the meta navigation in the footer
Page ID of the meta navigation in the header
Page ID of the supplementary area for content under the submenu
trans-unit.target: Seiten-ID des Ergänzungsbereichs für Inhalte unter dem Submenü

trans-unit.source: Comment to add to HTML head
Remove default JavaScript (external, internal, or empty for none)
trans-unit.target: Standard-JavaScript entfernen (external, internal oder leer für keine)

trans-unit.source: Enable spam protection for email addresses
Allow multiple accordion items to be open simultaneously
Open first accordion item by default
Default number of columns in grid containers
Default gutter size between columns (CSS value, e.g., 20px, 1rem)
Default tab position (top, bottom, left, right)
Maximum width for container wrappers (CSS value)
Default padding for container wrappers (CSS value)
Default header type for content elements (1=h1, 2=h2, etc.)
Maximum width for media in text
trans-unit.target: Maximale Breite für Medien im Text

trans-unit.source: Show confirmation page after form submission
Default sender name for form emails
Show validation errors inline with fields
Maximum number of related news items to show
Show back link to list in detail view
trans-unit.target: Zurück-Link zur Liste in Detailansicht anzeigen

trans-unit.source: Show related news in detail view
Date format for news items (PHP date format)
Default sort field for news list
Default sort direction for news list
Number of news items to display per page in list view
trans-unit.target: Anzahl der News-Einträge pro Seite in der Listenansicht

trans-unit.source: Automatically generate meta descriptions from content
Separator between page title and site name
Open Graph image height in pixels
Open Graph image width in pixels
Schema.org organization type (Organization, Corporation, LocalBusiness, etc.)
Default priority for sitemap entries (0.0 to 1.0)
Twitter Card type (summary, summary_large_image, app, player)
trans-unit.target: Twitter Card Typ (summary, summary_large_image, app, player)
